articles.title: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped
articles.mainIdea: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped
articles.summary: 24/7 Wall St.: Buffett’s $24 Billion Selling Spree: The 6 Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Dumped. Investors began to notice that Warren Buffett began being more conservative with the stock market three years ago, and that streak has continued even as the S&P 500 hit new peaks and beyond. He sold Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL), Bank of America (NYSE:BAC), VeriSign (NASDAQ:VRSN), DaVita (NYSE:DVA), D.R. Horton (NYSE:DHI), and Nucor (NYSE:NUE) as of Q3 2025. ... articles.title: HART CEO gets $350K following citywide pay raises
articles.mainIdea: HART CEO gets $350K following citywide pay raises
articles.summary: The Honolulu Star-Advertiser: HART CEO gets $350K following citywide pay raises. The board of directors for the Honolulu Authority for Rapid Transportation has approved a new 4 % pay raise for Executive Director and CEO Lori Kahikina to continue to oversee completion of the more than $10 billion Skyline project. Kahikina, who received a three-year, $336, 000 annual contract in September 2024, will now be paid $349, 440, following a $13, 440 “salary compensation ...
